SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.vector

Record Class VectorX

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
civitas.celestis.math.vector.VectorX
Record Components:
values - The component scalars of this vector.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vector, Serializable
public record VectorX(@Nonnull double[] values) extends Record implements Vector
A vector with no predefined length constraints. While VectorX is still immutable, it can be constructed with any size.
See Also:

      @Nonnull public Vector normalize()
